definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: terror, dreadful event, calamity, destruction—[[בַּלָּהָה]] Is 17:14; pl. [[בַּלָּהוֹת]] Job 18:11 + 7 t.; cstr. [[בַּלְהוֹת]] Job 24:17; —
only pl. terrors Job 18:11, Job 27:20, Job 30:15; ´[[מֶלֶח בּ]] Job 18:14 = death, cf. [[חַלְמָוֶת]] ´[[בּ]] Job 24:17.
calamity Is 17:14, pl. Ps 73:19; calamity, destruction Ez Eze 26:21, Eze 27:36, Eze 28:19.
